response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and a symbol of excellence. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $750,000. Considering its rarity and the potential it holds, I believe this is an exceptional deal. I look forward to discussing the details further and understanding how this product could enrich your collection or fulfill a specific need. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
